JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Skilled Trades Workers for Construction Projects
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are seeking a number of skilled trades workers for various construction tasks throughout Denmark. The available positions include:

·         Roofing Work (Arbejde med tagdækning)

·         Floor and Tile Installation (Arbejde med gulv- og klinkelægning)

·         Plastering Work (Stukkatørarbejde)

·         Building Insulation (Arbejde med isolering af bygninger)

·         Glazing Work (Glarmesterarbejde)

·         Plumbing Work (VVS-arbejde)

·         Carpenter

Requirements:

·         Relevant experience in the specified trades

·         Ability to work independently and as part of a team

·         Strong attention to detail and quality workmanship

·         Valid work permits for Denmark (if applicable)

·         Good communication skills

We Offer:

·         Competitive salary

·         Opportunities for professional growth

·         A dynamic work environment with diverse projects

How to Apply:

Please send your CV and a cover letter detailing your experience and qualifications to [email address] by [application deadline].

For more information, feel free to contact us at [phone number].

 

Join our team and contribute to exciting construction projects across Denmark
